pkgmetadata.longdescription: ========================Core Oaipmh Provider App========================OAI-PMH provider capabilities for the curator core project.Quickstart==========1. Add "core_oaipmh_provider_app" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting----------------------------------------------------------------.. code:: python INSTALLED_APPS = [ ... 'core_oaipmh_provider_app', ]2. Include the core_oaipmh_provider_app URLconf in your project urls.py-----------------------------------------------------------------------.. code:: python url(r'^oai_pmh/', include('core_oaipmh_provider_app.urls')),
